edu.dhbw.t10.manager.output
Class OutputManager

java.lang.Object
  edu.dhbw.t10.manager.output.OutputManager

public class OutputManager
extends java.lang.Object

The OutputManager provides the interface between the controller and Output.
It gives different meta methods for a better handling in the Output.

Author:
DanielAl

                         java.lang.String typed)
Overloaded method printSuggest to call the default function of printSoggest (wich marks the Suggested chars, func = 0)

Parameters:
newSuggest -
typed -

printSuggest

public void printSuggest(java.lang.String newSuggest,
                         java.lang.String typed,
                         int func)
Prints a new Suggest for given chars and mark the suggested chars, which aren't yet typed, if func = 0. This is the default function of printSuggest.
If func !=0 this function will only prints the suggest without marking the suggested chars. This is used, beacause, the unMark() method, which unmarks the suggest, doesn't work with all applications, and that is the workaround.

Parameters:
newSuggest -
typed -
func -

                       Key key)
Print a combination of keys, given by a list of ModeKeys and a finishing key

Parameters:
mks - list of ModeKeys to be pressed
key - key to be pressed at the end

keyIsChar

public void keyIsChar(Key key)

Parameters:
key -

keyIsBackspace

public void keyIsBackspace(java.lang.String oldTypedWord,
                           java.lang.String oldSuggest)
Handles a typed BackSpace.
If there is a typedWord delete the Mark if exists (delMark), delete the last typed char and print a new suggest.
If there is no typedWord send a BackSpace.

keyIsControlOrUnicode

public void keyIsControlOrUnicode(Key key)
Prints a Control or Unicode Key,
if no DELETE or BACK_SPACE, these are special Keys and handled with extra methods...

Parameters:
key -

muteButtonPressed

public void muteButtonPressed(MuteButton muteB,
                              Profile activeProfile)
Switchs between the three different Mute modes...
Modes are:
- AUTO_COMPLETING - If activated, this prints a suggested Word behind the typed chars and mark them... - AUTO_PROFILE_CHANGE - If activated, this changes the profiles based on the surrounded context. - TREE_EXPANDING - If activated, accepted words are saved in the dictionary...

Parameters:
muteB -

buttonPressed

public void buttonPressed(Button button,
                          Profile activeProfile)
Do the logic for a button event. Switch between different types, specific Keys and a Key Combination...

Parameters:
button -

clearWord

public void clearWord()
Sets the typedWord and the suggest to an empty String. So you can begin again with a new word.

keyIsCapsLock

private void keyIsCapsLock(Profile activeProfile)
Run this with a caps_lock key to trigger all shift buttons. If Shift state is DEFAULT, it will be changed to HOLD, else to DEFAULT

Parameters:
key -
